title: Ledger's Echo
outcome: Anonymous leaks unveil encrypted ledgers revealing decades of secret Council deals, compliance manipulation, and privilege abuse. Mass resignations, public outrage, and vigilante action follow. Ordinary citizens form new rotating councils by lottery, led by those once marginalized, as the city moves toward radically open government and a new kind of order.

events.description: Anonymous files leak online, detailing decades of secret BCI privilege, Council manipulation, and score tampering.
Mass resignations ripple through the Council, while angry crowds prevent former officials from using public services.
Citizens select rotating councils by public lottery, replacing the centralized leadership with a radically transparent, open system.
Marginalized citizens, including former 'ghosts,' guide decisions in the new system, establishing new principles for fairness and order.
